title: Publish MXD-MDA creative brief
acceptance_criteria: Creative brief lives in docs/ with sign-off from Crow and Glyph.
notes: Link outline to shared MXD-MDA narrative folder.

title: Stand up repository automations
acceptance_criteria: CI workflow validates lint + tests on every PR and reports back to Codex channel.
notes: Draft pipeline in GitHub Actions leveraging existing Node/Python setup.

title: Design generative art pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Figma frames + reference assets exported with documented prompts and style guardrails.
notes: Coordinate with Prime Alchemist for narrative touchpoints.

title: Prototype multimodal agent
acceptance_criteria: Agent demo handles text+image requests end-to-end with fallback strategy for API limits.
notes: Needs API key provisioning from Pulse before unblocked.

title: Publish contribution guidelines
acceptance_criteria: CONTRIBUTING.md updated with review matrix and automation checklist.

title: Build Notion/Wix sync job
acceptance_criteria: Nightly job pushes CSV updates to Notion database and Wix CMS via API.
notes: Document secrets handling and rotation cadence.

title: Launch community feedback loop
acceptance_criteria: Feedback form responses triaged weekly with labels for Story, Visual, Automation.
notes: Pilot with 5 power contributors before wider roll-out.

title: QA acceptance script for tasks
acceptance_criteria: CLI script validates schema, due dates, and owner assignments before publishing.
notes: Pair with Prime Alchemist to cover edge cases.
